jobs.title: Senior Software Developer
jobs.description: We're seeking an experienced software developer to join our development team. You'll work on custom software solutions for international clients using modern technologies.
jobs.requirements:
5+ years of experience in software development
Strong proficiency in React, Node.js, and Python
Experience with cloud platforms (AWS/Azure)
Excellent problem-solving skills
Strong communication skills in English
jobs.benefits:
Competitive salary and performance bonuses
Flexible working hours and remote work options
Health insurance coverage
Professional development opportunities

jobs.title: Cloud Accountant
jobs.description: Join our accounting team to provide virtual accounting services to US and UK clients. Experience with QuickBooks and cloud accounting platforms required.
jobs.requirements:
Bachelor's degree in Accounting or Finance
3+ years of experience in accounting
Proficiency in QuickBooks, Xero, and Excel
Knowledge of US/UK tax regulations
Strong attention to detail
jobs.benefits:
Competitive compensation package
Work with international clients
Career growth opportunities
Flexible schedule

jobs.title: Digital Marketing Specialist
jobs.description: Drive our digital marketing efforts across multiple channels. Develop and execute marketing strategies to grow our global client base.
jobs.requirements:
Bachelor's degree in Marketing or related field
2+ years of digital marketing experience
Proficiency in Google Analytics, SEO, and social media
Excellent written and verbal communication
Creative thinking and analytical skills
jobs.benefits:
Dynamic work environment
Opportunities for creativity and innovation
Performance-based incentives
Training and certification support
